Reviews.Title: My daughter loves it
Reviews.Author: A. Ward "mom to lots"
Reviews.Content: My 8 yr old wanted a camera, but little kid cameras we bought before were garbage, so she got this for Christmas.  She has taken video and stills with it so far, and has worked great.  I think it was a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Chelsea
Reviews.Content: Got my mom for Christmas, she just wanted a simple but good camera. She loves it and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Amazongirl
Reviews.Content: The GW w1000 is good all around camera. It is simple to use and takes great pictures. I am pretty hard on cameras and this one is very durable.

Reviews.Title: Ge W1000 10MP Digital camera
Reviews.Author: A FRIEND
Reviews.Content: I must say it is a very functional, user friendly camera that is wonderful for that price.Just need to get a pouch now.

Reviews.Title: Product was not new as advertised. The camera was broken.
Reviews.Author: SallyStraley
Reviews.Content: The camera didn't work. Things were missing from the box. This company COMPLETELY ripped me off. They sold me a broken camera. I contacted them, jumped through each and every hoop they asked me to jump through. I sent the broken camera back and they didn't refund my money. I wouldn't recommend buying anything from them. Shame on Amazon for working with them.

Reviews.Title: Thought GE was better than this.
Reviews.Author: russ
Reviews.Content: It stopped working (doesn't turn on) the first month we had it, save up a few more $$ to put towards a better camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera was defective, lost over $10 in shipping
Reviews.Author: Roger L Smith
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my granddaughter. It arrived in time but would not accept a memory card. I called and got a return authorization, it took a month to get my refund minus the $10 and change in shipping. I will never buy from this company again. I can see a fee for buyers remorse, but for a worthless non working product!

ProductInfo.Features:
Panoramic Stitching
Slink & Smile Detection
Face Detection
Red-Eye Removal
ProductInfo.Name: GE W1000 10MP Digital Camera
